CWEs: CWE-601: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
description: The function unique_name_489 is vulnerable to URL redirection attacks. In the onSuccess function, the user is redirected to the URL specified in req.query.from without proper validation. An attacker can craft a URL with a malicious redirect, which can lead to phishing attacks, stealing of user credentials, or other forms of session hijacking.
